name: procureserve-ii
description: Next-generation staffing platform with Supabase + SvelteKit

scripts.build: npm run build:customer && npm run build:console
scripts.setup: npm run setup:supabase && npm run setup:apps
scripts.setup:apps: cd apps/customer-app && npm install && cd ../console-app && npm install
scripts.types: cd supabase && supabase gen types typescript --local > ../packages/database-types/index.ts
